text:
For Jmeter, it is low level testing which focus on protocol. So should handle any Http response status.

For example, one of my Http request will return 401, that is expected. but Jmeter case will treat it as error, and stop running.
creator: wuyg719@gmail.com

Please subscribe to the user list and ask there.
